input.sentences: [male] | [female] and [female] decided to attend sunday service at the local church .
they noticed the statue of the congregation 's idol | [male] .
gold painted cherubs looked down on the events | judging silently .
[male] saw the financial riches of the church | saw the homeless outside in the busy city | and felt restless .
as they left the church | [male] became enraged and mockingly fought with [female] . [female] rolled her eyes . just another day in our wacky family .
output.sentences: Eugene went to church every Sunday
He admired the sacrifice of the Christ.
He admired the decorative elements on the ceiling.
He prayed that he would be a good person  and please the Lord.
And when he left the church he celebrated that he could go to the pub for a nice, cold, beer
